mapper.select: select * from employees order by employee_id
mapper.insert: insert into employees (employee_id, last_name, email, job_id, hire_date) values(#{employeeId}, #{lastName}, #{email}, #{jobId}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select * from tbl_notice order by 1 desc
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_notice (notice_id, notice_writer, notice_title, notice_subject) values (notice_seq.nextval, #{noticeWriter}, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeSubject})
